name: Minimalist Warrior Valpha.0.02
description:
This is the rpg ive made using rpgmaker vx ace.
Hotkeys: z and x , enter, dont forget to save often. always save before a boss and thats when you see a new colored square.

This version is very small compared to what should have been done during the time of the gamejam. but might be done afterward.
Credit to whoever is required to be credited in the script department:

yanfly,victor sant,RPGmaker source. some other i will not name,.
